thread.section_title: Nengun Performance評価／レビュー | お客様は Nengun Performanceの評価／レビューをしました。 | nengun.com
thread.title: Daniel Lora
thread.title_full: Nengun Performance について 投稿者 Daniel Lora

author: Daniel Lora
title: Daniel Lora
text: Nengun was the only place I could find the item I was looking for. It took me months of searching for a Recaro seat rail and bracket with no luck, until I reached out to Nengun Performance. Not only did they go out of their way to get this item to me, they had the ability to have it newly re-manufactured since it was unavailable from Recaro before they reached out. I even contacted Recaro directly beforehand, and they stated it was not available any longer and were unable to help. Nengun made it available for me. Do not hesitate to work with this great company.
